PlanetLab is powered by EdgeNet

PlanetLab

Welcome to PlanetLab

PlanetLab is a global research network that serves as an open platform for developing, deploying, and testing distributed systems and network services under real-world conditions at the edge.

PlanetLab is powered by the EdgeNet software, a modern edge computing platform built on Kubernetes.
